alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa; Johnson; Keokuk; Linn; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:43AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Linn, northern Keokuk, Iowa, Benton, northwestern Washington and northwestern Johnson Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 743 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Toledo to near Montezuma. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Keystone, Millersburg, North English, Van Horne, South English, Parnell, Atkins, Shellsburg, Newhall and Kinross. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 205 and 229. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for southeastern and east central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Iowa; Johnson; Keokuk; Linn; Washington
